00092       // ----------------------- Standard services ------------------------------
00093     public:

00587   struct DrawObjectAdjacencies : public DrawWithBoardModifier
00588   {
00589     DrawObjectAdjacencies( bool drawAdj = true )
00590         : myDrawAdj( drawAdj )
00591     {}
00592     void selfDraw( Board2D & board ) const
00593     {
00594       board.myModes[ "Object" ] = myDrawAdj ? "DrawAdjacencies" : "";
00595     }
